text: NGC 176 is an open cluster located around 3.5 million light-years in the constellation Tucana. This cluster consists of several stars together with another galaxy making it one of the most fascinating galaxies among nearby galaxies. It was discovered on August 12, 1834 by John Herschel. == See also == * Open cluster * List of NGC objects (1–1000) * Tucana ==References== == External links == * * * SEDS 0176 Category:Open clusters Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1834 Category:Discoveries by John Herschel Category:Tucana (constellation)
title: NGC 176
